Taiwan reports more Chinese balloons over Taiwan StraitTaiwan's defence ministry said on Sunday it had detected eight Chinese balloons crossing the Taiwan Strait in the previous 24 hours, of which five flew across Taiwan, the second day in a row is has reported a large number of balloons. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 01:21:25 GMT E2BUIBOAHFIRJEXWWXKJQHZKCI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-reports-more-chinese-balloons-over-taiwan-strait-2024-02-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Myanmar junta enforces mandatory military service for young peopleMyanmar’s junta has declared mandatory military service for all young men and women, state media said on Saturday, as it struggles to contain armed rebel forces fighting for greater autonomy in various parts of the country. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 00:18:55 GMT 46NIRDXTCBNGXOZUZSK7CUQNII https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/myanmar-junction-enforces-mandatory-military-service-young-people-2024-02-11/Reuters世界亚太地区
Nigeria's Access Bank Group CEO among six dead in California helicopter crashSix people, including the group chief executive of one of Nigeria's largest lenders, were killed in a helicopter crash in Southern California on Friday, authorities said. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 00:10:00 GMT GGEMAS4TZBLXNP2UPP3GM2MIOI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/nigerias-access-bank-group-ceo-among-six-dead-california-helicopter-crash-2024-02-11/Reuters世界非洲
Finland's Stubb seen as frontrunner in presidential run-offCentre-right Alexander Stubb of the National Coalition Party is the frontrunner in Finland's presidential run-off on Sunday, according to opinion polls, as the Nordic country elects a new leader of its security and foreign policy. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 00:03:34 GMT X4JAPXZOUNPJBHRTMKR2GPNEW https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/finland-stubb-seen-frontrunner-presidential-run-off-2024-02-11/Anne Kauranen世界欧洲
First female Argentine saint brings together Pope Francis and MileiPope Francis on Sunday will elevate to sainthood the first female saint from his native Argentina, an event that will be attended at the Vatican by his former strong critic, Argentine President Javier Milei. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 23:10:09 GMT XML4IGSRKNJZ3ALXJK6HAV2YD4 https://www.reuters.com/world/first-female-argentinean-saint-brings-together-pope-francis-milei-2024-02-10/Alvise Armellini世界
Russia closes presidential race candidate registration with Putin, three others, TASS reportsRussia's registration of candidates for the March presidential election has closed, TASS reported on Sunday, with a list including President Vladimir Putin, who is expected to win, and three politicians who all support Moscow's war in Ukraine. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 23:08:44 GMT 7SKPC7EIYJPGVOK76B7422OAZU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-closes-presidential-race-candidate-registration-with-putin-3-others-tass-2024-02-10/Reuters世界欧洲
King Charles gives thanks for support after cancer diagnosisBritain's King Charles on Saturday expressed gratitude to well-wishers following his cancer diagnosis, his first public comment since Buckingham Palace announced he would postpone some engagements to undergo treatment. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 22:18:22 GMT LRD4ILLRLTVIKNJRYTWJBS5R67U https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/king-charles-gives-thanks-for-support-after-cancer-diagnosis-2024-02-10/Reuters世界英国
At least five dead after soldier opens fire at military base in MogadishuAt least five people, including Somali military officials and a United Arab Emirates (UAE) soldier, were killed on Saturday after a soldier opened fire at a military base in the capital Mogadishu, an army officer and hospital staff told Reuters. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 19:55:31 GMT DLEJ3XNSVJIDLBUHHDUWNDCRIM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ Five-dead-after-shooting-in-somali-capital-2024-02-10/Reuters世界非洲
Zelenskiy fills out rebooted Ukraine military teamUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy announced five senior military appointments on Saturday, filling out a rebooted team after he named Colonel General Oleksandr Syrskyi this week as the new armed forces chief. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 18:26:41 GMT EGGW6I2WFNLXFEYNJEYVJVOYAU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-zelenskiy-fleshes-out-rebooted-military-team-2024-02-10/Reuters世界欧洲
Hamas had command tunnel under U.N. Gaza headquarters, Israeli military saysIsrael called the discovery new evidence of Hamas' exploitation of an agency that has been a lifeline for Gaza's population for years. The Palestinians have accused Israel of falsifying information to tarnish UNRWA. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 18:09:18 GMT R4ODNIHXUNMQVKGDQZDZKNUBZY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-had-command-tunnel-under-a-gaza-hq-israeli-military-says-2024-02-10/Dylan Martinez世界中东地区
Iran says it has exchanged messages with USIran and the United States have exchanged messages throughout Israel's four-month-old war on Hamas in Gaza, including about Lebanese armed group Hezbollah, the Iranian foreign minister said on Saturday. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 16:58:11 GMT JPBRZ4GPGZPYLJ7JUOCOUNT https://www.reuters.com/world/iran-foreign-minister-says-iran-us-have-exchanged-messages-recent-weeks-2024-02-10/Reuters世界
